m_szDocSumamry: Tesla Model X Spy Shots Compilation Originally published on EV Obsession . Update: At the request of the photographer, the first two photos in this compilation have been removed. I know — none of us can get enough Tesla Model X spy shots, and none of them are good enough. Still, by now, we’re getting a pretty good look at the thing from different angles and with different degrees of revelation. (Note that most of the picture below come from the Tesla Motors Club forum .)
